title: Jack and Jones Men's Basic V-Neck T-Shirt, Pack of 3, Plain Slim Fit in White, Black, Blue, Grey
descriptions: The perfect urban jeans outfit. With the classic T-Shirt by Jack & Jones. Men's fashion to match your lifestyle. The fashionable Jack & Jones men's T-Shirt with the classic V-neck always dresses you in style, modern – casual or elegant sporty. Hardly an occasion or a situation where you are not dressed appropriately with the modern designed Jack & Jones tee. Various colours match any urban denim wear – or with a sporty elegant suit. Cut a fine figure. With the timeless V-neck by Jack & Jones, you are always perfectly dressed. In classic white to grey and navy to black. Many colours for your diverse and varied lifestyle. Optimal wearing comfort – natural material – comfortable fit. The stylish T-Shirt in a normal regular slim fit is comfortable without being too tight. The classic cut skilfully emphasises the masculine figure. A visual highlight with a perfect fit. Comfortable and natural. Our Jack & Jones T-Shirt without motif print is made from 92% cotton and 8% elastane. Jack & Jones presents itself timelessly modern and casual to elegant. Show your style and taste. Every day – for any occasion. Care instructions (English language not guaranteed): Please turn inside out before washing. Machine washable up to 40 °C (delicate wash). Our T-Shirt is suitable for tumble drying on low thermal loads. Iron on medium setting.
